The top face is smaller than the bottom face. Coordinate System Start by creating a new coordinate system. Extrusion Extrude the sketch by 0.6619 units in the direction opposite to the normal. Scale the sketch by 0.1103 before extruding. This creates the rectangular prism with a tapered top and a flat bottom. Dimensions The height of this part is 0.1103 units, the width is 0.6619 units, and the length is also 0.1103 units.</description>
